chart_id.description: The name or ID of the chart (must be URL-encoded).

position.title: Position
position.description: The position of the legend on the chart. Possible values: Top, Bottom, Left, Right, Corner, Custom.

worksheet.title: Worksheet
worksheet.description: The name or ID of the worksheet (must be URL-encoded if using ID).

session_id.title: Session Id
session_id.description: Optional workbook session ID. If provided, will be sent in the 'workbook-session-id' header.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating a chart legend's properties.
